decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Unnumbered Site Location Plan, Unnumbered Design & Access Statement & 001, received on 31/01/2017.
Email with details of Refuse & Recycling Storage and Collection from Raquel Oliveira, received on 25/05/2017.
Unnumbered Refuse & Recycling Location Plan, received on 30/05/2017.
Email with details of Las Sisters opening hours from Raquel Oliveira, received 07/06/2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 2 - No fans, louvres, ducts or other external plant shall be installed without the prior approval of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 3 - The use hereby permitted shall not be open to customers outside the following times [7am to 7pm Monday to Saturday and 9am to 7pm on Sundays and Bank Holidays].

Condition : 4 - No servicing of the premises shall take place other than from the rear service / access road and the bins are to be kept in the designated area at the rear of the site and are only to be brought out for collection and returned immediately after.
description: Retrospective application for change of use of the premises from shop (A1 use) to restaurants and cafes (A3 use)
